However, the causal chain is underdeveloped, several sources are misapplied or extraneous, and the piece lacks discipline in numbers, scenario structure, and cross‑topic synthesis. tie each pillar to explicit market transmission (rates, FX/dollar, yields, equity multiples) and anchor claims to the four cited IDs after each sentence. 2) tighten numeric anchoring from sources: Ford—5% yield, forward P/E ~10x, Q2 EV losses ~$1.3B, F-Series leadership (22PL3Q360);
